name: FILMODŽI: First Contact Edition
description:
FILMODŽI: First Contact Edition

Trivia game where you guess the movie by selecting the correct set of three emoji characters. This demo edition of the game pays hommage to 28 fictional stories about encounters with various forms of unknown intelligence. It was made during 48 hours at Bratislava Game Jam 2021. Enjoy, vote and leave your feedback!

Created by: Dalibor Bartoš, Michal Kabát, Matej Vrzgula & Matěj Beránek.
